hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing

Class SwingObservables.ObservableKeyListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.DefaultObservable<java.awt.event.KeyEvent>
      • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing.SwingObservables.ObservableKeyListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<java.awt.event.KeyEvent>, Observer<java.awt.event.KeyEvent>, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    SwingObservables

    public static class SwingObservables.ObservableKeyListener
extends DefaultObservable<java.awt.event.KeyEvent>
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    The observable key listener which collects the keyTyped(), keyPressed(), keyReleased() events and relays it to next(). The original type can be determined by using KeyEvent.getType(). This observable never signals finish() or error().
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.02.01.

      static SwingObservables.ObservableKeyListener register(java.lang.Object component)
      Convenience method to register an action listener on an object which should have an addKeyListener() public method.
      SwingObservables.ObservableKeyListener registerWith(java.lang.Object component)
      Convenience method to register this observable with the target component which must have a public addKeyListener(KeyListener) method.
      SwingObservables.ObservableKeyListener unregisterFrom(java.lang.Object component)
      Convenience method to unregister this observable from the target component which must have a public removeKeyListener(KeyListener) method.

      • register

        @Nonnull
public static SwingObservables.ObservableKeyListener register(@Nonnull
                                                      java.lang.Object component)
        Convenience method to register an action listener on an object which should have an addKeyListener() public method. It uses reflection to detemine the method's existence. Throws IllegalArgumentException if the component is null or does not have the required method.
        Parameters:
        component - the target component.
        Returns:
        the observable action listener

      • registerWith

        @Nonnull
public SwingObservables.ObservableKeyListener registerWith(@Nonnull
                                                          java.lang.Object component)
        Convenience method to register this observable with the target component which must have a public addKeyListener(KeyListener) method.
        Parameters:
        component - the target component
        Returns:
        this

public SwingObservables.ObservableKeyListener unregisterFrom(@Nonnull

        Convenience method to unregister this observable from the target component which must have a public removeKeyListener(KeyListener) method.
        Parameters:
        component - the target component
        Returns:
